channel.title: Objects .. non-working?
channel.description:
Hey, Devolution based server ;)
I have created a new method, for a skill. Now; the objects in yanille will work, although the same objects, same IDs in rellekka don't? I have used the traditional Devo "oadd" command on the object, but when u click the ones in Rellekka, the player turns to the object, but doesn't do what he is supposed to, in the meantime back up in yanille, you click the object, and it does what it should, Anyone got any idea why it won't work?
I have tried re-creating the rocks by using an addGlobalObject method, they still wouldn't work.
Any help is appreciated.
Thanks!!

item.title: Objects .. non-working?
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

The “oadd” (“odump”) method which i was using on the rocks was adding them to the file, and they don’t work…

Read full topic

item.title: Objects .. non-working?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

It makes the objects only work if they are located in the object.cfg file, you can either keep adding them in there, or remove it all together.

Read full topic

item.title: Objects .. non-working?

item.description:

Hey, Devolution based server
